It's the real deal. Also some claim the remix is most obvious on the drum track. The remix of the drums is much more tighter and often rolls from the right to left channel or "visa versa".  

Also, it's Amazing the Wave files took only 373 megs. Thanks for this DCC gold remix oldiesguy8898.
